name: intrIoT
0:
”Alexa, open intri i. o. t”
”Alexa, tell intri i. o. t to select Switch”
”Alexa, launch intri i. o. t”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: intri i. o. t.
des:
intrIoT skill allows the customers of intrising Network Inc. to control devices by using Amazon Alexa service.

intrIoT provide several voice command support on device like: select, checking device, turn on (off) ... etc, user can remotely control devices.

Remind that: NOT ALL commands are supported by each devices, it depends on machine TYPES

General commands
1-1. Select an online device, e.g: select {Device Name}
1-2. List devices -> Show all available online devices.

For Switch type device:
2-1. Turn on/off {PortName} power -> This will turn on/off port's PoE
2-2. Reboot This device -> This will restart this device

For Controller type device:
2-1: Play {TX} on {RX} -> this will switch RX to TX's group
2-2: Report status ->this will tell all your Extender device that you can control with your Controller.

Version:1.0.0
